QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, patient_gender, patient_year_of_birth, patient_state + '_' + cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) location_source_value, date_service, case when data_vendor like 'Private%' then 44814724 else 0 end as PeriodTypeConceptId, prov_dispensing_npi, ndc_code, 38000177 drug_type_concept_id, dispensed_quantity, refill_auth_amount FROM {sc}.pharmacy_claims JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where logical_delete_reason is null or logical_delete_reason = '' or logical_delete_reason = 'null' order by 1
